content.question: Line 12 (Audendum . . . Venus) is translated

choices.label: It is a daring thing: brave men help their own love.
It has been dared: brave Venus will favor us.
It must be dared: Venus herself helps the brave.
Dare to do it: brave Venus orders these very things

content.answer: It must be dared: Venus herself helps the brave.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
